title: Electropop Heroes Vol 1 (2003)
description:
RELEASEDATE: DECEMBER 1, 2003

Releasemagazine.net review:

This is a compilation of different Nordic artists within the electronic pop genre. Some might call it futurepop, some might not. I call some of it good music, at the very least, with the favourite being Daybehavior's Ã¢â‚¬Å“Close Your Eyes (Aktivated mix)Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½. Crisp production, excellent chorus and danceable like hell. Hint to DJ's: play it in clubs. 
Most tracks here drift toward the dancefloor, so the tempo is high throughout. Other top tracks include Ã¢â‚¬Å“Synchronized Hearts (Elektrokardiogramm Mix)Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ by Colony 5, the fantastic and aptly titled Ã¢â‚¬Å“Favourite Song (Remix)Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ by Sweep, and Ã¢â‚¬Å“HezitateÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ by Swedish newcomers Michigan.

I think this is an interesting selection of tracks, from both oldies and fresh acts. It shows that we are still very able to make good electronic music here up north.
